name: STRATIS
0:
”'Alexa, Turn On The Light'”
”'Alexa, Set The Thermostat To Cool'”
”'Alexa, Set The Thermostat to 72'”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Want to connect your Amazon Echo device to the other smart devices in your STRATIS enabled unit? Control your lighting, thermostat, shades, fan, outlets, and STRATIS scenes through your Amazon Echo (or other Echo devices) for greater ease and enhanced Resident experience.

Use the same account you use to log in to the STRATIS mobile app to enable Alexa with STRATIS. 

New features and improvements are made regularly to continue to improve your experience. 

We greatly appreciate your feedback. If you love STRATIS, please let us know with a rating. If you have any issues with the app, please let us know by visiting help.stratisiot.com and we will do everything we can to improve your experience.
